title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 8 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 8 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

There is no Deep State, there's just The State. NSA spied on Tucker Carlson. Imagine if Trump administration had spied on Rachel Maddow? Where is the arrest in the General Flynn leak? The liberal media will ignore the Tucker Carlson story. Glenn Greenwald explains how the intelligence agencies spy on you. The FBI is protecting you from LEGOs. Pundit Matthew Dowd: January 6 Was WORSE Than 9/11.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
